func.title: SetCursor

param.name: no_select_arrow
param.desc: If specified and not false, no cursor arrow is drawn when the object is selected.

func.desc: Sets the control cursor of a player to the specified object and selects this object for player control. Returns false if the target object is currently deactivated by SetCrewEnabled.
func.remark: Prior to 9.0 OC this function was available from global context with an additional first parameter int player.
